# k8s_infinispan_org_backup_v2alpha1 (Data Source)

Backup is the Schema for the backups API

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "k8s_infinispan_org_backup_v2alpha1" "example" {
  metadata = {
    name      = "some-name"
    namespace = "some-namespace"

  }
}
```
